snippet.title: Sonic The Hedgehog But It's Actually Persona - Sonic Robo Blast 2: Persona
snippet.description:
Mod made by Lat' as well as various other modders/programmers. You can download this Sonic Robo Blast 2 mod from here:
https://mb.srb2.org/showthread.php?t=50008

It's Sonic but with Persona gameplay. I'll be honest, I never played the Persona games, or RPG's for that matter. And the reason is simple, I don't like RPG's... like... at all (only exception being Undertale, but that one is the outlier). I won't explain why I don't like them in the description, but even with that in mind, I still find this SRB2 mod to be really really REALLY cool.

And after playing it... I still don't like RPG's... but dammit if it isn't worth playing.

Anyways, please enjoy the video. :)

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/marius_rednblue
My Steam Page: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198106610936
